programme.desc: Vários habitantes de South Park estão ficando cada vez mais furiosos, e sem alguma razão aparente. Randy é o principal responsável para descobrir uma solução para este problema. Enquanto isso, Kyle tenta "conseguir uma ereção".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan tem que ir com os seus pais para uma festa chata repleta dos alunos menos populares do colégio, como Butters, Pip e Dougie. Enquanto isso, Randy e Gerald passam por uma situação um tanto quanto incômoda em uma jacuzzi.
programme.sub-title: Dois caras nus em uma banheira

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Já que Butters parece encaixar tão bem com Cartman, Kyle e Stan, seus pais decidem ir com eles para passar um final de semana em Aspen. Ao chegar em Aspen, Stan, que não é nada experiente, se vê forçado a competir contra um campeão de ski.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan fuma uns cigarros de maconha que uns rapazes mais velhos deixaram e, pela noite, aparece um homem de 32 anos perdido e drogado que diz ser o Stan do futuro.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Um novo aluno mórmon se muda à South Park, mas não se dá bem com ninguém. Os rapazes querem que Stan comece uma briga com ele, mas na verdade, ele acaba se tornando seu amigo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Wendy termina o seu relacionamento com Stan, e para ajudá-lo, os meninos o levam a um restaurante famoso por suas asas de frango e suas belas garçonetes. Mas o plano não funciona e Stan se une a um grupo de góticos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os protetores dos animais se manifestam contra o uso de uma vaca como mascote da escola, e os estudantes se veem forçados a buscarem uma nova mascote, o que gera um conflito entre Cartman e Kyle, já que ambos tem ideias diferetes.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan se encontra com alguns lindos animaizinhos do bosque, que pedem para ele alguns favores inocentes. Após ajudar todos eles, Stan descobre que na verdade eles tem um plano para trazer o anticristo para o mundo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Cartman acabam inundando um dos vilarejos próximos a South Park. Como resultado, a cidade de South Park é declarada em estado de emergência, já que todos acham que isso é obra do aquecimento global.
programme.sub-title: Dois dias antes de depois de amanhã

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan estava buscando algo "divertido e grátis" para passar o tempo e aceita fazer um teste de personalidade oferecido por uns cientologistas e descobre que o seu "nível de alma" é surpreendentemente alto.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Agora Stan é o novo treinador de um time de hockey infantil e tenta fazer com que eles ganhem tudo. Enquanto isso, seu pai precisa lidar com a recordação do terrível desempenho de Stan em uma partida há alguns anos atrás.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan quer saber a verdadeira razão para as crianças decorarem os ovos de Páscoa e o que ovos e coelhos tem a ver com a morte de Jesus. Para chegar à verdade, Kyle e Stan se envolvem com uma sociedade bizarra que guarda um segredo lendário.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Kyle se tornam obcecados pelo Guitar Hero, chegando ao ponto de baterem recordes. Depois de um tempo Stan pensa que poderia ir mais longe na carreira com um parceiro diferente.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Um dia, os moradores de South Park acordam e descobrem que estão sem Internet. Randy descobre que ainda há Internet na Califórnia e junto com a sua família, eles se dirigem para o Oeste do país.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Enquanto a cidade está ocupada apontando culpados pela crise econômica, Randy apresenta uma solução para as dificuldades financeiras. Com a ajuda de todos os moradores, a cidade passa a viver sem qualquer economia.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Chegou a hora da corrida de pinhos em South Park e Stan e Randy estão trabalhando duro para construir o melhor carro. Enquanto trabalha no carro de corrida, Randy adquire um componente muito especial para garantir o primeiro lugar de Stan.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan se mobiliza para impedir que os japoneses matem todas as baleias e os golfinhos do mundo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os meninos fazem um perfil de Stan no Facebook contra a sua vontade. Stan acaba ficando de saco cheio com os pedidos de amizade e tenta deletar seu perfil, mas ele acaba sendo sugado para dentro do mundo virtual do Facebook.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan sofre de transtorno de acúmulo de bugigangas e, juntamente, com o Sr. Mackey, aceita ser tratado por especialistas. Stan entra no mundo dos sonhos

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A vida de Stan está um verdadeiro desastre, tanto em casa quanto na escola. Enquanto isso, a obsessão de Randy com a comida está mudando tudo, e inclusive faz com que Sharon descubra novos interesses.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Ao completar 10 anos de idade, a visão do mundo de Stan muda e também suas amizades.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan está tentando fazer com que sua vida volte ao normal e acaba descobrindo algo terrível. Enquanto isso, Cartman faz o melhor hambúrguer da cidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman lança seu próprio canal de vendas de joias na televisão. Isso gera um negócio bastante lucrativo, já que as joias, na verdade, são falsas.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Butters é vítima de um bullying improvável. Agora ele quer conscientizar os demais alunos sobre os perigos do bullying e, para isso, ele faz um grande vídeo de dança.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O mundo está abalado pela recente notícia do uso de drogas por um ícone amado, e todos estão se sentindo perdidos e traídos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os garotos tentam impedir que seus pais machuquem uns aos outros usando como distração o jogo Minecraft.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan fica viciado no mais recente aplicativo do Terrance e Phillip. Enquanto os próprios Terrance e Phillip não estão se sentindo bem sobre a fortuna que eles estão fazendo em seu novo jogo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Randy vê uma oportunidade de sucesso para a Fazenda Tegridade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes saem para caçar com Jimbo, o tio de Stan, e seu velho amigo vietnamita Ned. Enquanto isso, um monstro misterioso que vive na montanha os ameaça e um vulcão bem próximo a South Park está a ponto de sofrer uma erupção.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan tem um novo cachorro chamado Sparky, que ao que tudo indica, é gay. Isso vira motivo de piada entre seus amigos. Quando Sparky foge, Stan vai ao Santuário de Animais do Grande Gay Al e aprende algumas coisas sobre a homossexualidade.
programme.sub-title: Grande cruzeiro do Big Gay Al

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O avô de Stan está fazendo 102 e quer se matar, mas como não pode fazer isso sozinho, pede a ajuda de Stan. Enquanto isso, a senhora Broflovski protesta contra um famoso programa da televisão um tanto quanto inapropriado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A tia Flo está de visita e dá um presente para Stan: um peixe medonho. Com o tempo, começam a aparecer alguns cadáveres por aí, e a mãe de Stan tenta fingir que não tem nada a ver.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Vários habitantes de South Park estão ficando cada vez mais furiosos, e sem alguma razão aparente. Randy é o principal responsável para descobrir uma solução para este problema. Enquanto isso, Kyle tenta "conseguir uma ereção".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan tem que ir com os seus pais para uma festa chata repleta dos alunos menos populares do colégio, como Butters, Pip e Dougie. Enquanto isso, Randy e Gerald passam por uma situação um tanto quanto incômoda em uma jacuzzi.
programme.sub-title: Dois caras nus em uma banheira

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Já que Butters parece encaixar tão bem com Cartman, Kyle e Stan, seus pais decidem ir com eles para passar um final de semana em Aspen. Ao chegar em Aspen, Stan, que não é nada experiente, se vê forçado a competir contra um campeão de ski.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan fuma uns cigarros de maconha que uns rapazes mais velhos deixaram e, pela noite, aparece um homem de 32 anos perdido e drogado que diz ser o Stan do futuro.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Um novo aluno mórmon se muda à South Park, mas não se dá bem com ninguém. Os rapazes querem que Stan comece uma briga com ele, mas na verdade, ele acaba se tornando seu amigo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O restaurante favorito de Cartman foi fechado e substituído por uma loja que vende maconha medicinal. Enquanto Randy quer conseguir uma prescrição médica para comprar maconha, Cartman fará de tudo para ter de volta sua amada galinha frita.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman quer se tornar um corredor da NASCAR, mas ele acha que não tem condições porque não é "pobre e suficientemente estúpido" para alcançar seus sonhos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman tem um ataque de raiva quando os tamanhos dos pênis dos garotos são colocados no mural da escola de South Park e acabda sendo enviado para uma terapia de controle da raiva.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Noventa e nove por cento dos alunos estão contra Eric Cartman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman finalmente admite que é gordo e providencia imediatamente uma scooter para se locomover.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman consegue se infiltrar na agência de segurança nacional.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Token é considerado por Cartman uma ameaça a toda a humanidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os meninos criam uma empresa na qual eles não fazem nada, e enfim optam pelo nome "The Washington Redskins".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman ganha seu próprio banheiro dizendo que ele é "transginger" claro significado de transgenero.Segredo de Randy é revelado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman foi diagnosticado com ansiedade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman conta para seus amigos sobre o seu sonho em que apareciam uns alienígenas que o abduzem e lhe introduzem uma sonda anal. Mas ao que parece, não foi apenas um sonho, já que algo está enlouquecendo as vacas deste pequeno vilarejo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman ganha o concurso "Salve o nosso frágil planeta" e é anunciado que Kathie Lee Gifford viajará a South Park para entregar o prêmio a ele em mãos, então, Cartmam decide entrar em forma tomando as pastilhas de Aumento 4000.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman descobre a verdadeira identidade do seu pai. Uma tempestade de neve prende os garotos no hospital. A equipe do America’s Most Wanted está na cidade. A equipe e os moradores ficam isolados e consideram o canibalismo.
programme.sub-title: A Mãe do Cartman Continua Sendo uma Vaca

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes estão em um dia de passeio pelo planetário e um dos funcionários lava o cérebro deles com efeitos visuais para que eles queiram voltar para lá.
programme.sub-title: Roger Ebert deveria demitir os alimentos gordurosos

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman acha que é muito maduro para sair com Stan, Kyle e Kenny, e decide buscar novos amigos na internet, mas termina se metendo em vários problemas com pedófilos. Enquanto isso, Kenny tenta evitar que seus pais tenham outro filho.
programme.sub-title: Cartman entra para a ASNAMB (Associação De Sósias Norte-Americanos Do Marlon Brando)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Todos acham que Cartman está muito gordo e decidem enviá-lo a um "Acampamento de Gordos" para perder peso. Por outro lado, Kenny está topando fazer qualquer coisa por dinheiro, e isso o leva às mais diversas insanidades.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Scott Tenorman é um rapaz do oitavo ano que engana Cartman ao vender seus pentelhos. Agora, ele fará o que for preciso para recuperar o seu dinheiro. Participação especial: Radiohead.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman recebe como herança de sua avó um milhão de dólares e decide cumprir seu maior sonho: comprar um parque de diversão somente para ele, no qual ele não precisa fazer fila para subir nos brinquedos, já que ninguém mais pode entrar.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman se fantasia de um robô chamado "Genial-O 4000" e Butters acredita que ele de fato é um robô. Porém, a piada de Cartman se transforma em um pesadelo quando ele descobre que Butters tem um vídeo dele fantasiado de Britney Spears.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman estava tentando voar, mas o máximo que conseguiu foi um golpe na cabeça e isso fez com que ele ficasse dois dias em coma. A polícia local assume que agora Cartman tem poderes psíquicos e que pode resolver casos extraordinários.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os meninos ficam com raiva de Cartman quando ele come a parte mais gostosa das asas de frango, e decidem ignorá-lo. Todos começam a fazer o mesmo. Ao ser ignorado por todos, ele começa a pensar que está morto e que agora é um fantasma.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman promove o ódio na escola contra os meninos com cabelo vermelho, sardas e pele pálida, dizendo que eles não tem alma e não sobrevivem ao sol. Kyle, indignado, decide converter ele em um.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Al Gore visita a escola de South Park e tenta convencer Stan, Kyle, Cartman e Kenny para sair e caçar o perigoso homem-urso-porco. Ao ajudá-lo nesta missão, os rapazes acabam ficando presos em uma caverna.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A mãe do Cartman quer encontrar uma maneira de controlar o seu filho. Ela busca ajuda em alguns programas de televisão, mas sem muito sucesso. Eis que surge César Millan, um adestrador de cães que aceita o desafio.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O senhor Garrison precisa explicar a Teoria da Evolução em aula, mesmo que isso vá totalmente contra os seus valores. Enquanto isso, Cartman mal pode esperar o dia em que lançam o seu novo videogame preferido.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman resolve congelar a si mesmo em uma tentativa desesperada de suportar a espera do lançamento do novo Nintendo Wii. Ele acaba despertando apenas 500 anos mais tarde, em um futuro nada agradável, e o pior de tudo: sem Nintendo Wii!

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman faz uma brincadeira que terminou com um mal-entendido envolvendo seu pai e uma posição um tanto quanto constrangedora. Agora, Butters deve ir a um acampamento de cura gay.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Após ver um garoto com Síndrome de Tourette em uma loja, Cartman fica obcecado por isso. Ele descobre que se aparentar ter a doença Tourette, ele poderá dizer o que quiser sem precisar encarar consequências.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Depois de receber um resultado inesperado ao realizar um exame de amígdalas, Cartman fica cara a cara com sua própria mortalidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Em tempos de aflição e grande desespero, um jovem de South Park decide manter a ordem na cidade. Surge Guaxinim, que se torna o vigilante solitário de South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O sonho de Cartman de viver a vida de um pirata se tornará realidade, se ele conseguir chegar à Somália.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman jura que viu um duende. Ele está tão obcecado com isso, que inclusive faz uma aposta com Kyle para provar que os duendes existem. Eles encontram o duende, e agora Kyle precisa cumprir com a aposta.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Kyle se tornam prisioneiros do Pentágono até contarem exatamente como chegaram à Terra da Imaginação. Cartman não desistirá da aposta e quer que Kyle chupe suas bolas, conforme o combinado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Quando estão na Terra da Imaginação, Stan e Butters tem que lutar contra um exército de forças imaginárias do mal. A Suprema Corte declara que as criaturas imaginárias não são reais e planeja destruir a Terra da Imaginação.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Kyle se tornam obcecados pelo Guitar Hero, chegando ao ponto de baterem recordes. Depois de um tempo Stan pensa que poderia ir mais longe na carreira com um parceiro diferente.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: As meninas do quarto ano fizeram uma lista secreta que dá nota a todos os garotos, do mais bonito ao mais feio. Os garotos roubam a lista e os resultados não são o que eles esperavam.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Enquanto a cidade está ocupada apontando culpados pela crise econômica, Randy apresenta uma solução para as dificuldades financeiras. Com a ajuda de todos os moradores, a cidade passa a viver sem qualquer economia.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan se mobiliza para impedir que os japoneses matem todas as baleias e os golfinhos do mundo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: As últimas notícias sobre testes científicos realizados na escola de South Park revelam que alguns dos meninos estão viciados em sexo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle, Cartman Kenny e Stan se juntam com os cidadãos de South Park e lutam bravamente contra a dominação de Nova Jersey em uma onda que está afetando todo o país

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está "intestinalmente" envolvido no desenvolvimento de um novo produto revolucionário que será lançado pela Apple chamado HumancentiPad.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle participa do mais recente empreendimento de Cartman, a Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack.
programme.sub-title: Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os garotos estão próximos de descobrir a verdade sobre o primeiro Dia de Ação de Graças da história dos Estados Unidos.
programme.sub-title: Dia de Ação de Graças no History Channel

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Ike chega à puberdade, mas Kyle se preocupa com o fato de que ele e seu irmão menor estão se distanciando. Dessa forma, Kyle o leva a uma apresentação ao vivo de seu programa de TV favorito.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle não entende por que Ike e seus amigos querem ver as pessoas comentar sobre coisas acontecendo, em vez de experimentá-la por si mesmos. Enquanto isso, Randy tem que apresentar ao vivo para fazer algum dinheiro.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle ainda está pertubado pois Ike e seus amigos o chamam de vovó. Enquanto isso, vários hologramas estão à solta em South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Heidi Turner quer iniciar uma dieta vegana com Eric Cartman, enquanto Kyle quer saber o motivo pelo qual ele ainda está com ela. Neste mesmo capítulo, veja como a popularidade do presidente diminui cada dia mais.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O diretor PC começa a nutrir sentimentos amorosos pela vice-diretora da escola. Terrance e Phillip querem assinar um contrato com a Netflix e Kyle está cansado de ser humilhado por Heidi e Cartman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A mãe de Kyle faz um transplante fecal e os meninos recebem a missão de pegar o melhor microbioma.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes querem se destacar na aula de genética para irritar Terrance e estão tentando fazer um cruzamento entre o elefante de Kyle com a porca do Cartman, "Fofa".
programme.sub-title: Um elefante faz amor com um porco

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está se sentindo só por ser judio. Fora isso, ninguém acredita nele quando ele tenta convercer os cidadãos de South Park sobre a existência de Mr.Hankey, o cocô do Natal.
programme.sub-title: Sr. Hankey, o Poo de Natal

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavação escolar e saem no jornal. Barbra Streisand aparece na cidade buscando o tal objeto, pois é a última peça necessária para que ela possa se transformar em um monstro japonês gigante.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os garotos descobrem o que significa ser circuncidado e tentam salvar Ike do seu destino. O senhor Mackey é demitido, se entrega às drogas e se torna um hippie.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes estão viciados em "Chinpokomon" (uma paródia de Pokémon) e querem comprar os bonecos, os jogos e qualquer outra coisa relacionada com eles.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais não deixam. Cartman sugere que ele vá à polícia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O primo do Kyle, que também se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua mãe em South Park. Porém, apesar da mesma idade, os primos não tem nada em comum.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os locutores do show da baleia Jambú fazem com que as crianças acreditem que a baleia pode falar, e que ela se chama Willzyx, que está doente e morrerá se não regressar à sua casa na lua. Agora os meninos querem levar a baleia para a lua.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O pai de Kyle compra um carro híbrido e tenta convencer todas as pessoas de que esta é a melhor opção para cuidar do planeta. Porém, ao brigar com todos em função de sua atitude esquisita, se muda para São Francisco com sua família.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman acha que os ataques do dia 11 de setembro fazem parte de uma conspiração, e se dispõe para trazer a verdade à luz. Enquanto isso, o senhor Mackey apenas quer saber quem foi o infeliz que defecou no mictório.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman jura que viu um duende. Ele está tão obcecado com isso, que inclusive faz uma aposta com Kyle para provar que os duendes existem. Eles encontram o duende, e agora Kyle precisa cumprir com a aposta.

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: This Oscar®-nominated film has the legendary Cary Grant as a government attorney who can't seem to shake his bad fortune. Living on a houseboat, widowed and left with three unruly kids, he hires Sophia Loren as a governess.

programme.title: Indiscreet
programme.desc: Cary Grant is the suave American diplomat who pretends to be married in order to preserve his bachelor status. Ingrid Bergman is the glamorous leading lady of the London stage who has no scruples about having an affair with a married man.

programme.title: Pardners
programme.desc: A rich momma's boy returns west with the son of his murdered father's partner to foil a gang trying to gain control of his family ranch. They accidentally clean up the town.

programme.title: How To Succeed In Business Without Really Trying
programme.desc: This hilarious musical stars Robert Morse as a charming and scheming window washer who climbs to the top of the corporate ladder by way of a self-help book.

programme.title: The World of Henry Orient
programme.desc: Peter Sellers stars as a hilariously seedy concert pianist who is nearly driven mad after he becomes the obsession of two crush-crazed schoolgirls in this poignant, funny look at innocence lost. Angela Lansbury and Paula Prentiss also star.

programme.title: Pardners
programme.desc: A rich momma's boy returns west with the son of his murdered father's partner to foil a gang trying to gain control of his family ranch. They accidentally clean up the town.

programme.title: Marty
programme.desc: Ernest Borgnine won a Best Actor Oscar for his role as a Bronx butcher who gives up on love, until he meets an equally lonely school teacher in this charming story that garnered a total of four Oscars including Best Picture.

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: This Oscar®-nominated film has the legendary Cary Grant as a government attorney who can't seem to shake his bad fortune. Living on a houseboat, widowed and left with three unruly kids, he hires Sophia Loren as a governess.

programme.title: Indiscreet
programme.desc: Cary Grant is the suave American diplomat who pretends to be married in order to preserve his bachelor status. Ingrid Bergman is the glamorous leading lady of the London stage who has no scruples about having an affair with a married man.

programme.title: Accident Man
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethan’s wife.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Agent Ethan Hunt and his elite team go underground after a bombing implicates them as terrorists. While trying to clear their name, the team uncovers a plot to start a nuclear war.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: Armored
programme.desc: A crew of officers at an armored transport security firm embark on the ultimate heist – against their own company. The seemingly fool-proof plan soon proves to be useless when an unexpected witness interferes, as the plan quickly unravels.

programme.title: Succubus
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: The Sound
programme.desc: A skeptic of the supernatural (Rose McGowan) uses soundwaves to debunk paranormal activities. But her skepticism is tested while investigating the dark depths of a haunted subway station - where a terrifying evil awaits! Christopher Lloyd co-stars.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: Following a mysterious disappearance on a jump, a group of skydivers experience paranormal occurrences that leave them fighting for their lives.

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: The Faculty
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: May
programme.desc:
May grew up as a lonely oddball whose only friend was a perfectly kept doll. When she moves to L.A., she takes up with a handsome filmmaker and then an alluring lesbian, but every connection she makes turns out deadly.
Rated R

programme.title: Faceless After Dark
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Tusk
programme.desc: A U.S. podcaster (Justin Long) ventures into the Canadian wilderness to interview an old man (Michael Parks) who has an extraordinary past, and the American learns the man has a dark secret involving a walrus.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers
programme.desc: After making a horrific discovery in the basement of a old church, Trish and her brother Darry watch their routine road trip home turn into a heart stopping race for their lives. They are now the chosen prey of a force that relentlessly pursues them.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: The other Crasher Squad members are suspicious of Takeru, due to his Esper power and mysterious ability to control Gaia. Now, Takeru must face the Gishin assassin alone.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: After hearing his fellow Crasher Squad members say they cannot fight alongside a Gishinian, Takeru takes off into space with Gaia.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: The Gishinians finally discover where the Six God robots are stationed. They attack Egypt where Sphinx, the body unit of God Mars, is located.
programme.sub-title: The Six Gods, Unable To Combine?!

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: A giant space fleet has left Earth to construct a base on Pluto and the Crasher Squad has been assigned to guard the fleet. However, Takeru hears a mysterious voice in his head urging him not to go to Pluto.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: Takeru bombs the Spaceport and a young boy, who admires Takeru, witnesses him in the act. With pictures to prove his guilt, Takeru is taken into custody.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Gon departs on a journey to take the Hunter Exam and meets Leorio and Kurapika who also want to be Hunters.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: If Gon, Leorio and Kurapika cannot answer an old woman's question correctly, they will be immediately disqualified.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Escorted by the Kiriko the trio finally arrive at the exam site.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: The exam for the First Phase consists of following Satotz, the proctor to the site of the Second Phase.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Misty wetlands await the participants as they emerge from the long tunnel. Visibility is poor and various monsters lie in wait.
programme.sub-title: Hisoka x Is So x Sneaky

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Proctors Menchi and Buhara's test consists of preparing a dish that will satisfy the palate of Gourmet Hunters.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Netero challenges Gon and Killua to a simple game. If they win, they earn the right to become Hunters.
programme.sub-title: Showdown x On x The Airship

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: The airship arrives at the site of the Third Phase. To pass this test, entrants must reach the base of the tower within 72 hours.
programme.sub-title: Decision x By x Majority Rule?

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Gon chooses the challenge where the person whose candle goes out first loses, but finds his candle has been tampered with

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Leorio loses patience as Kurapika refuses to deliver the final blow. An uneasy mood settles over the five as time continues to tick away.
programme.sub-title: The Trick x To x The Trick

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: With the score at 2 wins, 2 losses, the final do-or-die match is entrusted to Killua.
programme.sub-title: Trouble x With x The Gamble

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: The five must vote and decide by majority rule on which path to take out of two.
programme.sub-title: Final x Test Of x Resolve

programme.desc: Jun Fudo is taken by a mysterious woman and finds herself being attacked by a werewolf-like creature. As she tries to save herself, she transforms into Devil Lady.

programme.title: Coming to America
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: After a humiliating experience on an airplane, Nashawn sues the airline and is awarded a huge settlement. Determined to make good with the money, Nashawn creates the full service airline of his dreams, complete with sexy stewardesses & funky music.

programme.title: Good Burger
programme.desc: Kel are serving up laughs! They're the good guys in Good Burger, a zany comedy inspired by the popular Kel routine from Nickelodeon's hit series All That.

programme.title: All Styles
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Coming to America
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Harlem Nights
programme.desc: In the waning days of Prohibition, Sugar Ray and his adopted son, Quick, run a speakeasy called Club Sugar Ray. Gangster Bugsy Calhoune pays corrupt cop Phil Cantone to close Club Sugar Ray down.

programme.title: Good Burger
programme.desc: Kel are serving up laughs! They're the good guys in Good Burger, a zany comedy inspired by the popular Kel routine from Nickelodeon's hit series All That.

programme.title: Coming to America
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Death Warrant
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude van Damme ("Bloodsport", "Cyborg") is a veteran undercover cop posing as an inmate in a dangerously corrupt state prison.

programme.title: Double Impact
programme.desc: Identical twins are separated at six months and raised on different continents. They reunite twenty-five years later to avenge the murder of their parents and reclaim their stolen family fortune.

programme.title: Universal Soldier
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: Timecop
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: Double Team
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.title: Knock Off
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme plays a fashion designer who must join forces with a C.I.A. agent to combat terrorism.

programme.title: Legionnaire
programme.desc: Alain is a boxer in 1925 Marseille, France. When he doesn't take the dive paid to take by a mob boss, he has to split. He joins the Foreign Legion and is sent to Morocco. He makes 3 friends and they watch each other's backs.

programme.title: Replicant
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme squares off against his deadliest opponent yet -- himself -- when he stars as both a heinous serial killer and the replicated clone that scientists have constructed in order to kill him.

programme.title: Postcards from the Edge
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, Shirley MacLaine, Gene Hackman, Dennis Quaid and Richard Dreyfuss star in Mike Nichols' hilarious blockbuster film about a very real mother-daughter relationship set against the backdrop of today's Hollywood. Rated: R

programme.title: Safety Not Guaranteed
programme.desc: When an unusual ad inspires three cynical Seattle magazine employees to look for the story behind it, they discover a mysterious eccentric named Kenneth, a likable but paranoid supermarket clerk, who believes he's solved the riddle of time travel.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Adaptation
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians threatens to move the team unless they deliver immediate results. She then fills the roster with has-beens to guarantee their failure. But the team miraculously rallies together and starts to win.

programme.title: Caddyshack
programme.desc: It's the snobs against the slobs! While caddy Danny tries to impress elitist Judge Smails, a crude construction tycoon tries getting accepted at the country club, and a groundskeeper stalks a gopher.

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage garnered a Best Actor Oscar for his hauntingly disturbing portrayal of a suicidal alcoholic who falls for a compassionate Las Vegas prostitute (Elisabeth Shue) in one of the year's most critically acclaimed films.

programme.title: The Wood
programme.desc: Lots of guys have second thoughts about marriage. Three hours before his wedding, Roland is having third, fourth and fifth thoughts. Good thing he’s got buddies Slim and Mike around to help.

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Max and Page are a mother/daughter con team. Max targets wealthy men and marries them. Page then seduces them while Max "catches" her wayward husbands in the act. Then on to the next mark, posing in a variety of guises to keep one step ahead of the law.

programme.title: At First Sight
programme.desc: AT FIRST SIGHT is the story of a young woman architect who falls in love with a blind man. She encourages him to undergo a radical operation to restore his sight, but ultimately his truest vision comes from the love he finds in his heart.

programme.title: Angel Eyes
programme.desc: After meeting under extraordinary life-and-death circumstances, a Chicago police officer (Lopez) and a lost soul named Catch (Caviezel) fall in love. While uncovering the truth about Catch, she is forced to deal with the secrets of her own past. Rated-R

programme.title: The Wood
programme.desc: Lots of guys have second thoughts about marriage. Three hours before his wedding, Roland is having third, fourth and fifth thoughts. Good thing he’s got buddies Slim and Mike around to help.

programme.title: Practical Magic
programme.desc: For two sisters from a family of witches, falling in love is the trickiest spell. They struggle to use their gift for magically guiding fate to overcome their family curse: The men they fall in love with are doomed to an untimely death!

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: A mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100% of his brain's abilities transforms a struggling writer into a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with many dangers.

programme.title: Thunderheart
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: When a tech blogger lands an interview with a tech guru and stops an attack on him, he finds a mysterious ring that takes him back 57 seconds into the past.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

programme.title: Drive
programme.desc: A Hollywood stunt performer (Ryan Gosling) who moonlights as a wheelman discovers that a contract has been put on him after a heist gone wrong.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Jack Ryan is caught in the middle of a terrorist attack. Ryan helps to thwart Holmes’ assailants and becomes a local hero. But Ryan’s act marks him as a target. Now he must return to action to save his family.

programme.title: Mile 22
programme.desc: CIA operative Silva and his team race against time, facing military, police, and gangs, to transport an intelligence asset 22 miles to safety in Southeast Asia.

programme.title: The Tailor of Panama
programme.desc: Based on the 1996 novel, this is a mixture of thriller and black comedy. Harry Pendel is the tailor to the powerful of Panama. Harry is known for his storytelling and suits, but soon his tales carry lethal repercussions.

programme.title: Interstellar
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: In 1962 London, the lifelong friendship between two teenagers (Elle Fanning, Alice Englert) dissolves after one seduces the other's father.

programme.title: Junebug
programme.desc: Rising stars Amy Adams and Ben McKenzie light up the screen in this award-winning comedy about love, family, ambition, and the choices that come with each. When worldly art dealer Madeleine (Embeth Davidtz) meets her new Southern in-laws. Rated: R

programme.title: The End of the Tour
programme.desc: A funny and touching exploration of fame, success, and friendship as we follow journalist David Lipsky (Jesse Eisenberg) during five days he spent on the road interviewing renowned and reclusive novelist David Foster Wallace (Jason Segel).

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Wild Bill
programme.desc: Wild Bill focuses on the last days of gunfighter, Wild Bill Hickok, consorting in Deadwood with Calamity Jane, observed by a longtime friend, and haunted by the ghosts of his past, from an old flame to a young man who announces his intention to kill Bill.

programme.title: The Good, The Bad And The Ugly
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood portrays the invincible 'Man With No Name' in lethal pursuit of $200,000 in Confederate money alongside Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach in this renowned, influential, and classic cinematic western directed by the great Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this brazen tale about a rampaging band of vigilantes who make two mistakes: they hang the wrong man and they don't finish the job. Inger Stevens, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern & Dennis Hopper co-star in this action-packed western.

programme.title: The Claim
programme.desc: THE CLAIM is an epic story of love, passion and redemption set against the winter landscape of the Sierra Nevada Mountains and the making of California. Dillon is a pioneer who defied the harsh winter in search of rumored gold.

programme.title: Blackthorn
programme.desc: Sam Shepard is Butch Cassidy in this thrilling western about the legendary outlaw's return from exile. After years of quiet, he embarks on his greatest adventure since his glory days with the Sundance Kid.

programme.title: Jane Got a Gun
programme.desc: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

programme.title: First Cow
programme.desc: Two travelers, on the run from a band of vengeful hunters in the 1820s Northwest, dream of striking it rich—but their tenuous plan to make their fortune on the frontier comes to rely on the secret use of a landowner's prized dairy cow.

programme.title: The Homesman
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones stars in “the best western since UNFORGIVEN” (BBC). A low-life drifter helps a headstrong woman (Hilary Swank) cross the frontier after she rescues him from hanging.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom brings you thrills and excitement. Indy, his sidekick Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott go from high-flying action above the Himalayas to a spine-tingling escape from a fortress-like mine in India.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: STEVEN SPIELBERG and GEORGE LUCAS bring you the greatest adventurer of all time! Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull finds Indy trying to outrace a brilliant and beautiful agent for the mystical, all-powerful crystal skull of Akator.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay and executive producer Steven Spielberg comes a thrilling battle between the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons. When their epic struggle comes to Earth, Sam Witwicky becomes mankind's last chance for survival.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: The battle for Earth continues when college-bound Sam Witwicky learns the truth about the ancient origins of the Transformers and must join in their continued battle against the Decepticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earth's past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons.

programme.title: Love and Monsters
programme.desc: In a monster-infested world, Joel (Dylan O'Brien) learns his high school sweetheart (Jessica Henwick) is just 80 miles away. Now, Joel must discover his inner hero, facing unknown dangers on the impossible journey to be with the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethan’s wife.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Agent Ethan Hunt and his elite team go underground after a bombing implicates them as terrorists. While trying to clear their name, the team uncovers a plot to start a nuclear war.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: The English Patient
programme.desc: Unforgettable and powerful, this winner of 9 Academy Awards, including Best Picture, Best Director (Anthony Minghella) and Best Supporting Actress (Juliette Binoche) unfolds an incredible tale of passion, intrigue, and adventure.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
programme.desc: Jack Ryan must quickly evolve from soldier to analyst to full-fledged operative to stop a devastating terrorist plot against the United States.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Jerry Maguire is a sports agent who is brought to a point of crisis in his life when he decides to become an honorable man. Follow his journey to redemption through an unlikely alliance with a female accountant, and his least important client.

programme.title: Elizabethtown
programme.desc: Drew Baylor, a hot-shot designer whose life becomes completely unraveled on one fateful day. En route to Elizabethtown, Drew meets Claire. She's beautiful, and she has decided to be just the gal to guide Drew on his journey back home.

programme.title: Bad Ass 3: Bad Asses on the Bayou
programme.desc: Frank Vega (Danny Trejo)) and Bernie Pope (Danny Glover) return, this time to Louisiana in an attempt to find a kidnapped friend.

programme.title: Hyena Road
programme.desc: Three men, three different paths, caught in conflict but brought together to save lives: a highly skilled sniper who can’t think of his targets as human, an intelligence officer who has never killed while on duty.

programme.title: Mimic
programme.desc: From Oscar winning director Guillermo del Toro (THE SHAPE OF WATER) comes the ultimate battle between man and nature. Once a miracle of genetic engineering, what was created in the lab has evolved to mimic the most dangerous predator of all—humans.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A.
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.’s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Species
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: Escape Room
programme.desc: For a birthday celebration, three couples partake in an ESCAPE ROOM, in which they must work together to solve puzzles in order to escape the room—but when the game turns deadly, they quickly learn the only winners are the survivors.

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man
programme.desc: Three friends stumble upon the horrific origins of a mysterious figure they discover is the root cause of the evil behind unspeakable acts.

programme.title: The Innkeepers
programme.desc: After over one hundred years of service, The Yankee Pedlar Inn is shutting its doors for good. The last remaining employees - Claire and Luke - are determined to uncover proof of what many believe to be one of New England's most haunted hotels.

programme.title: We Are What We Are
programme.desc: The Parkers, reclusive people who cling to ancient customs, find their secret lives threatened when a torrential downpour and the death of the family matriarch forces daughters Iris and Rose to assume special responsibilities.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: An escaped maniac returns to his childhood home on Christmas Eve, which is now a sorority house, and begins to murder the sorority sisters one by one. A remake of the 1974 film by Bob Clark.

programme.title: We Summon The Darkness
programme.desc: A post-concert party at a remote country mansion turns into a grisly satanic slaughter scene in this dark-humored horror-thriller starring Alexandra Daddario and Johnny Knoxville.

programme.title: Escape Room
programme.desc: For a birthday celebration, three couples partake in an ESCAPE ROOM, in which they must work together to solve puzzles in order to escape the room—but when the game turns deadly, they quickly learn the only winners are the survivors.

programme.title: Silent Hill
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling horror action game, Silent Hill stars Radha Mitchell (Man on Fire) as Rose, a desperate mother who takes her adopted daughter, Sharon, to the town of Silent Hill in an attempt to cure her of her ailment. Rating: R

programme.title: Silent Hill: Revelation
programme.desc: Heather Mason and her father have always tried to stay one step ahead of the malevolent forces intent on their destruction. But on the eve of her 18th birthday, a dangerous revelation leads her deeper into a demonic world.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: The heat is on in this fast-paced action-comedy starring Eddie Murphy as Axel Foley, a street smart Detroit cop tracking down his best friend's killer in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The heat's back on! And Eddie Murphy is cool as ever in this sizzling, smash-hit sequel to Beverly Hills Cop.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Eddie's back! So are the laughs. Eddie Murphy returns as Detroit cop Axel Foley, getting down with the fun-and-sun set as never before in this revved up thrill-ride of a movie.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: The heat is on in this fast-paced action-comedy starring Eddie Murphy as Axel Foley, a street smart Detroit cop tracking down his best friend's killer in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Days of Thunder

programme.title: Naruto

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: American Hustle
programme.desc: The con is on when scam artists and lovers Irving Rosenfeld and Sydney Prosser are entrapped by ambitious FBI agent Richie DiMaso and coerced into participating in a sting operation that hinges on snaring politician Carmine Polito and his associates.

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: Mitch joins a prosperous Memphis firm that affords Mitch and his wife an affluent lifestyle beyond their wildest dreams. But when FBI agents confront him with evidence of corruption and murder within the firm, Mitch sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Teen Witch
programme.desc: One week before her sixteenth birthday, a girl realizes that she is the descendant from one of the witches of Salem. She uses her newfound powers to snag herself the football-hero as her boyfriend and to become the most popular girl in school.

programme.title: Purple Rain
programme.desc: Headstrong, vulnerable young musician The Kid (Prince) struggles with his own inner demons and with his alcoholic father who beats his mother. But the madness infects his music, fueling a sound that transforms the struggling, young rocker into a star.

programme.title: Hollywood Shuffle

programme.title: Purple Rain
programme.desc: Headstrong, vulnerable young musician The Kid (Prince) struggles with his own inner demons and with his alcoholic father who beats his mother. But the madness infects his music, fueling a sound that transforms the struggling, young rocker into a star.

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel
programme.desc: Mike (Gary Cole) is a planning a surprise wedding anniversary party for Carol (Shelly Long) - until Carol's long-lost first husband, Roy (Tim Matheson), shows up to shake the family tree.

programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Five…or so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Shakky explains why Sabaody Archipelago seems to be crawling with bounty hunters – eleven of the Grand Line's most wanted pirates are currently ashore and two of them are in Luffy's crew!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger keeps Zoro from tangling with a powerful Celestial Dragon, and Chopper goes bonkers when Camie disappears from the amusement park.
